Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: titleForImageSource

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: navBarBackgroundColor
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: The background color of the navigation bar

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: navBarTitleColor
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: The color of the navigation bar’s title

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: cancelButtonColor
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: The color of the cancel button

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: doneButtonColor
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: The color of the done button

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: removeButtonColor
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: The color of the remove button

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: imageSourcesTitleColors
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Title color for a specific image source, defaults to .blue

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: imageSourcesBackgroundColor
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: BackgroundColor for a specific image source, defaults to .white

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: backgroundColorForSection
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: BackgroundColor for a specific collectionView in a section, defaults to .black

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: pageControlTintColor
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Color of the not selected dots of the pageControl

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: pageControlCurrentIndexColor
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Color of the currently selected dot of the pageControl

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: heightForSection
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Height for each section, if nothing is specified, calculateSectionsHeight() function will fill

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: sizeForImagesPickerView
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Size of each thumbnail image shown in the .pickerView section, defaults to 1:4 of the screen’s width

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: paddingForImagesPickerView
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Padding for each image shown in the .pickerView section, defaults to 0

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: imageSourcesCellWidth
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Size of each image source’s cell shown in the .imageSources section, defaults to the screen’s width divided by the total number

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: selectedImagesContentMode
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Content Mode for images in the .selectedImages section, defaults to .scaleAspectFill

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: maxNumberOfSelectedImages
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Maximum number of selected images, defaults to 5

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: sectionsOrderArray

Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: imageSourcesArray
Structs/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Changes the order of the imageSources shown in the .imageSources section
